profiles.name: Lori Baker
profiles.title: Literary Arts faculty members are practicing writers who are active in the worlds of publishing, editing, translation, web-based film and production, and scholarship. They work with undergraduate students and with graduate students who are seeking the MFA degree, offering genre-specific and multidisciplinary writing workshops, reading and writing courses, and special topics seminars. Literary Arts faculty members also serve as advisors for undergraduate honors theses and for MFA theses.
